short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Peeka (Beta): Short Peeks, Big Insights - Your Personal Youtube GPT (YTGPT)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Peeka extension gives you the superpower to peek into any youtube video you visit. Providing you with:

1. Transcript of the video
2. TL;DW (Too Long Didn't Watch)
3. Detailed Chapter breakdown and insights of the video
4. Key Questions that are answered in the video

This extension is useful for you if you often find yourself struggling to catchup with so many insightful videos you find on YT but don't have time to watch'em all.

That's not it our early adopters will get free access to the upcoming feature: "Why watch a video when you can interact with it by asking any question you want"

Equip yourself with Peeka and experience magic! Your very own YTGPT!
